page.title: 03GAMES CHILDREN PLAY KILMRNCK
page.content: {KICK THE CAN,POISON POT,JUNGLES,ALI {BALI,BUZZ,RED ROVER AND UNDER ARM TIG. { {KICK THE CAN:}PLAYERS GATHER ROUND AND CHOOSE SOMEONE TO BE HET. ONE OF THE PLAYERS THROWS THE CAN AND WHILE THE PERSON WHO IS HET RUNS TO FETCH IT ALL THE OTHERS HIDE. HE LOOKS FOR THE OTHERS AND WHEN HE SEES ONE HE CALLS HIS NAME,RUNS BACK TO THE CAN AND SHOUTS"IN DEN 1 2 3." IF ONE PLAYER MANAGES TO KICK THE CAN WITHOUT BEING CAUGHT ALL THE OTHERS CAN HIDE AGAIN. {JUNGLES:}ONE PLAYER ACTS AS CALLER AND SHOUTS OUT,IN ANY ORDER,THE NAMES OF ANIMALS."ELEPHANTS"PLAYERS DASH TO CORNERS. "SNAKES" PLAYERS FLOP DOWN."MONKEYS"PLAYERS PERCH ABOVE GROUND. "TIGERS" PLAYERS FREEZE. LAST PLAYER TO COMPLETE EACH ACTION IS OUT.
